DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial study educational intervention parent provider increase human papillomavirus ( HPV ) vaccination rate younger girl Ohio Appalachia . Educational intervention may effective increase number participant whose daughter receive HPV vaccination .
DOC.brief_title: The Parents Appalachia Receive Education Needed Teen Project
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Implement multi-level HPV vaccine educational intervention direct 3 level within participate 12 Ohio Appalachia counties include information cervical cancer , cervical cancer screening , HPV , HPV vaccine , communication skill train improve parent-health care provider conversation HPV vaccine , organizational level component . II . Evaluate effectiveness multi-level HPV vaccine educational intervention group randomize control trial 12 Ohio Appalachia county . OUTLINE : Participants randomize 1 2 arm . Arm I : Parents health care provider receive educational material HPV vaccination mail in-person review project staff include culturally tailor HPV cervical cancer educational video brochure , question answer ( Q & A ) fact sheet , HPV cervical cancer resource list . Clinics receive wait exam room poster brochure , tabletop card , reminder card mail participant , information resource list , newsletter , vaccine tracking system , `` invitation vaccinate '' letter mail parent . Arm II : Parents health care provider receive educational material influenza vaccination mail in-person review project staff . After completion study , participant follow 3 6 month .
